pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/orderdict.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/orderdict/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install orderdict```#### Examples```python>>> import orderdict>>> metadata = dict(version="1.0.0", name="pkgname"){'version': '1.0.0', 'name': 'pkgname'}>>> orderdict.order(["name", "version"], metadata)OrderedDict([('name', 'pkgname'), ('version', '1.0.0')])```
